title: Jira
description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Jira Source.

use_board_ownership.title: Use Board Ownership
use_board_ownership.description: Use Jira boards for assigning owners of tasks, or use projects.

truncate_limit.title: Truncate Limit
truncate_limit.description: Truncate the descriptions of projects, tasks, and epics.

exclude_fields.title: Exclude Fields
exclude_fields.description: List of fields to exclude when saving tasks. Defaults to no exclusions.

additional_fields_array_limit.title: Additional Fields Array Limit
additional_fields_array_limit.description: Truncates an additional field's array value to the given length.
